en-US.Basic instructions on using this site: Basic instructions on using this site
en-US.Change routing from single segment to al: Change routing from single segment to all segments
en-US.Click on the frowny-face to login to OSM: Click on the frowny-face to login to OSM. We'll make it worth your while!
en-US.Copy and paste the code below in order t: Copy and paste the code below in order to show this map on your webpage.
en-US.File uploaded successfully, It will take: File uploaded successfully, It will take some time to add it to OSM database.
en-US.Generate A URL To Share With Your Friend: Generate A URL To Share With Your Friends!
en-US.Installation instructions for Locus on d: • Surf to this site from your mobile device and follow the instructions
en-US.Installation instructions for Locus on m:
• Click "Start Download"
  • Wait for the download to complete
  • Go to "Maps", select "Offline", and then choose the map you downloaded
en-US.Installation instructions for Offroad on:
• In order to download the maps in off-road application you'll need to enter the Maps menu
  • Download off-line maps
  • Click on Israel Hiking
  • When the download end you'll need to go back to Maps menu
  • Choose under map type: off-line

• Open the Off Road application
  • Select "Menu", then "Maps", and "Offline map"
  • Choose the requested map
  • Wait for the download to complete
  • Return to the "Maps" page and select "Map Type"
  • Choose "Offline"
en-US.Installation instructions for OruxMaps o:
• Surf to this site from your mobile device and follow the instructions
    - OR -
  • Click on 'Start Download' and wait for the zip file to finish downloading.
  • Connect the Android device to your PC.
  • If needed, change your Android device USB connection mode from 'USB for charging' to 'File transfers'.
  • On your PC:
    • Open the downloaded zip file and copy the directory it contains to a temporary location, such as your Desktop.
    • Move this directory into the 'Oruxmaps/mapfiles' directory of the connected Android device.
  • Open OruxMaps and refresh the offline maps by:
    Maps → Switch map → OFFLINE → Refresh (the counter-clockwise arrows)

• Click "Start Download"
  • Wait for the download to complete
  • Go to "Maps", select "Switch map", and then "Offline"
    • Click "Refresh" (the counter-clockwise arrows)
    • Choose the map you downloaded
    • The free space required is twice the size of the downloaded map.
